title: BB code instead of whatever boards is currently using
body:
Can we please transfer boards over to BB code instead of whatever trash we are currently using?

Seriously the amount of times i've had to edit posts because i've being using * or any other little thing is just getting a little rediculous.

And there seems to be no real point to what has been added, apart from being generally annoying some times.

Example of one i found today:

1. This is for a list

But if i choose to explain this down here

2. And then use a 2 here, boards says no.

EDIT: As a note, try quoting and you will see the above.
